summary: D'Artagnan and his fellow Musketeers plot to replace the ineffectual Louis XIV of France with his secretly imprisoned twin brother Phillipe, who is the firstborn and rightful King.
cast: Richard Chamberlain|Patrick McGoohan|Louis Jourdan|Jenny Agutter|Ian Holm|Ralph Richardson|Vivien Merchant|Brenda Bruce|Esmond Knight|Godfrey Quigley|Emrys James|Denis Lawson|Ann Zelda|Hugh Fraser|Stacy Davies|John Cording|Terry Richards|Max Amyl|François Guillaume|Pierre Marteville|Jean Reney|Fred Wood
title: La máscara de hierro
